snippet.title: [DOS] Mangchi The Hammer Boy 꼬마대장 망치 Kkoma Daejang Mangchi - Longplay
snippet.description:
It's a 2.5 platformer game based on a korean cartoon "Hammer boy".
For some reason the beautiful animated computer graphics cutscenes have not been recorded, I'm sorry. There is a princess to save that was visible in the cutscenes.

The artstyle of this game is very colorful and well done and the game tries to create a diversified gameplay between the platform stages. 

Unfortunately the jump in 3 dimension is quite difficult to perform since commands respond poorly, but the game has some interesting ideas even if their implementation is not very good.
